title: Handwritten typeface from "The Casual Vacancy" title sequence
content:
Hi everyone,

I'm looking to ID a font for a friend. It appears on the title sequence for the new BBC TV series, The Casual Vacancy by J. K. Rowling.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415095847im_/http:/typophile.com/files/11001651_10153653362876982_5996140195735472864_o_6147.jpg)

If anyone can help that would be great.

Thanks,

Nat
author: The White Lion

comments.content: My guess is that it is hand drawn and not a font. The repeating 'a' is quite different.
